property.name: Text
property.value: When this has at least one Upgrade and defends -> He gets +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has at least 3 Upgradesw and Battles -> He gets +3 [ATK] and +3 [DEF] until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this has at least 2 Upgrades and attacks -> He gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your characters get Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth against Autobots and Decepticons. When you flip to this mode -> Autobots and Decepticons can't use Stealth this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Flip this and draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may play a [Bl] card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Repair 3 damage from this.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has Stealth while untapped (Enemies attack other characters if able.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Safeguard 3 (Can't take more than 3 damage while undamaged) When you shuffle your deck and this doesn't have a battle card under him - Put the bottom card of your deck face down under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this has a battle card under him - You may play another action on each of your turns.

property.value: When this has an Black Icon Upgrade and you flip to this mode - Move 1 damage counter from this to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this has an Black Icon Upgrade - She has Pierce 3 (Do at least 3 damage when attacking, bur not more than attack total.)

card.name: Raider Ratbat - Spy Patrol, Fuel Scout

property.name: Text
property.value: Revenge - Choose a bttle icon color. Then look at your opponent's hand and scrap a card from it that has a battle icon of that color. (Use a character's revenge abilities when it's KO'd)

alternate.name: Raider Ratbat - Spy Patrol, Fuel Scout

property.name: Text
property.value: Tap - Reveal the top card of your deck. Repair 1 damage from each of your characters for each different color among that card's battle icons. (To Tap, tap this character before you attack)

card.name: Raider Tailwind - Air Strike Patrol, Strategist

alternate.name: Raider Tailwind - Air Strike Patrol, Strategist

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode - Reveal the top card of your deck. For each Black Icon it has, move a damage counter from one of your Planes to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least one Black Icon - Your opponent chooses a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Black Icons you flipped and reveals them. You scrap one of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your cards get Bold 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your opponent plays an Action - They Choose one of their characters and do 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy - Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty - Play an Action from your opponent's scrap pile.
